metadata.synopsis: After the player promises to help the gondians, Toobin says worried ADs to himself during his idle.
metadata.how_to_trigger: behaviour AD for Toobin while he is waiting for the player to explore floor 2

0.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
0.text: Is this too big a risk? What if we are caught? No - there is no other way.
0.context: NodeContext: worried, trying to be calm

1.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
1.text: Obelia - I would do anything to hug you again.
1.context: NodeContext: worried, trying to be calm

2.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
2.context: NodeContext: worried, trying to be calm

3.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
3.text: Help is coming, Obelia - just hold on.
3.context: NodeContext: worried, trying to be calm
